History

  0.5
    New: model and version are now Keywords arguments 

  0.4
    Fix: when you enter an empty parameter an error was raised when you publish the document

  0.3
    New: Quicktime movie file can be also referenced by absolute links 

  0.2
    New: Reference lookup window

  0.1
    Initial Release
